alert.note: Alert for Essex; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 6:59PM EDT until April 06 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND...RICHMOND...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND CENTRAL ESSEX COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tall Timbers to Hague to near Warsaw, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Farnham around 715 PM EDT. Callao and Kinsale around 720 PM EDT. Lewisetta around 730 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Wellford, Ethel, Currioman Landing, Lottsburg, Threeway, Village, Mount Holly, Rexburg, Oldhams and Lyells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
